snippet: The new series had nearly 7.2 million viewers on Monday night, making it the most popular new series on cable this year. Its lead-in, "The Closer," had 9.1 million viewers for its finale.
abstract: The new series had nearly 7.2 million viewers on Monday night, making it the most popular new series on cable this year. Its lead-in, "The Closer," had 9.1 million viewers for its finale.

headline.main: On TNT, 'Major Crimes' Replaces (and Gets a Boost From) 'The Closer'
